title: Apocalypsis Apocalypseos, or, The revelation of St. John the Divine unveiled containing a brief but perspicuous and continued exposition from chapter to chapter, and from verse to verse, of the whole book of the Apocalypse / by Henry More ...
author: More, Henry, 1614-1687.
publisher: Printed by J.M. for J. Martyn and W. Kettilby ...,
notes: Pages 147-150 are missing in the filmed copy. Pages 140-165 photographed from Bodleian Library copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
